title: #179: The Science of Cheating -- How to Prevent and Deal With Infidelity
description: I talk to relationship expert Duana Welch about what science says about when relationships go wrong. We tackle infidelity, porn use, how to break-up, and even how the death of a significant other effects men. Duana and I get into the nitty gritty in this show. You don't want to miss this one.
author: contact@artofmanliness.com (The Art of Manliness)
